Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: LAKEFORMATION | S3  
Update requires: No interruption

AccessTypes.description: The Amazon S3 or AWS Lake Formation access type.
AccessTypes.markdownDescription:
The Amazon S3 or AWS Lake Formation access type.

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

SourceName.description: The name for a AWS source. This must be a Regionally unique value.
SourceName.markdownDescription:
The name for a AWS source. This must be a Regionally unique value.

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

SourceVersion.description: The version for a AWS source. This must be a Regionally unique value.
SourceVersion.markdownDescription:
The version for a AWS source. This must be a Regionally unique value.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^(latest|[0-9]\.[0-9])$  
Update requires: No interruption

AwsLogSource.description: Amazon Security Lake supports log and event collection for natively supported AWS services.
AwsLogSource.markdownDescription:
Amazon Security Lake supports log and event collection for natively supported AWS services.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

SourceName.description: The name for a third-party custom source. This must be a Regionally unique value.
SourceName.markdownDescription:
The name for a third-party custom source. This must be a Regionally unique value.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^[\\\w\-_:/.]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

SourceVersion.description: The version for a third-party custom source. This must be a Regionally unique value.
SourceVersion.markdownDescription:
The version for a third-party custom source. This must be a Regionally unique value.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 32  
Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9\-\.\_]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.description: The name of the tag. This is a general label that acts as a category for a more specific tag value (value).
Key.markdownDescription:
The name of the tag. This is a general label that acts as a category for a more specific tag value (value).

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value that is associated with the specified tag key (key). This value acts as a descriptor for the tag key. A tag value cannot be null, but it can be an empty string.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value that is associated with the specified tag key (key). This value acts as a descriptor for the tag key. A tag value cannot be null, but it can be an empty string.

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: No

DataLakeArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN for the data lake.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: Replacement

ExternalId.description: The external ID used to establish trust relationship with the AWS identity.
ExternalId.markdownDescription:
The external ID used to establish trust relationship with the AWS identity.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 2  
Maximum Length: 1224  
Pattern: ^[\w+=,.@:/-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Principal.markdownDescription:
The AWS identity principal.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^([0-9]{12}|[a-z0-9\.\-]*\.(amazonaws|amazon)\.com)$

SubscriberIdentity.markdownDescription:

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^[\\\w\s\-_:/,.@=+]*$

Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of objects, one for each tag to associate with the subscriber. For each tag, you must specify both a tag key and a tag value. A tag value cannot be null, but it can be an empty string.
